q: Bill Lockyer stayed for just a minute, though. On his way out he said he was only delivering reading material for the lawmakers, copies of Michael Lewis ' book about Wall Street and the financial crisis, The Big Short: Inside the Doomsday Machine. "It's good to read," Bill Lockyer said.

Guido pursued the political power nexus between News Corp and the David Cameron clan with the same vigour he employs to uncover politicians' secrets? "The BBC is the pervasive influence on our society," he argues. It is monolithic and uses all of its old-school-tie contacts. Jeremy Clarkson don't think Rebekah Brooks comes from that background. At least with Murdoch you know where you stand. The Guardian targeted Andy Coulson over the phone-hacking affair "as a proxy because you all hate News International," he claims. Analyst Misek said Apple's future is likely to increasingly overlap with Google in the areas of cloud computing, advertising, and content. Eric Schmidt could help position Apple for that shift. While I believe Mike Pence would have been a viable candidate for the presidential nomination, I also believe he has the qualifications and experience to be an effective governor.... I will be at the top of the list of people encouraging Mike Pence to seek the Republican nomination for Gov. Rick Perry .-- U.S. Sen. Dan Coats , R-Ind. Sunday night at Staples Center. http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_28pts_Kleiza_41pts_vs_Boozer_Jazz_NBA_07/08 For one night, Linas Kleiza overshadowed Allen Iverson and Carmelo Anthony . Linas Kleiza scored a career-high 41 points and grabbed nine rebounds as the Denver Nuggets beat the Utah Jazz 120-109 on Thursday night. I've now scored 40 points on the highest stage you can ever score, said Linas Kleiza , whose previous career-high of 29 came March 15 against the Los Angeles Lakers. It felt good when it left my hand, I knew it had a chance, said Allen Iverson of his game winner.
